author: Stephanie Hogan
title: 'Go home and stay home.' But also exercise. How do we do that?
description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau told Canadians to "go home and stay home." Public health officials say it's okay to go out and exercise. Other local leaders are advising everyone keep 2 metres apart. We clear up some of the confusion.
content:
The message from Prime Minister Justin Trudeau this week was clear:
"Go home and stay home."
But public health officials have also been advising Canadians trying to follow that advice, that they can and even should get outside daily for some exercise. 
The… [+7074 chars]
